title: Poster, "Sterling Wortmen - Rockefeller Foundation", 1980
medium: Photo etching on heavy cream wove paper
markings: Embossed border and seal at lower right (of the Rockefeller Foundation.)
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Rectangle of gray and brown, bisected with band of black with Sterling Wortmen in full justification printed in gray. Black text on brown. Below, reproduction of the signatures of individual trustees separated by brown bands.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Sterling Wortmen - Rockefeller Foundation", 1980.Photo etching on heavy cream wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-422.
